result.title: TOMORROW workbook
result.description: The TOMORROW workbook (in English) will outline the format of the training including the reasoning, contents, targeted trainees, and the programme. It will also summarize the learnings from the training that can inform the set-up of the Masterclasses (T4.4). The deliverable will become part of the TOMORROW toolbox to be shared with interested cities.

result.title: 2 sets of policy recommendations
result.description: One set of recommendations for local governments to become transition leaders This will take the form of a short publication and will be disseminated through the project partners networksA second set of policy recommendations will be addressed to the EU and national level in order to remove barriers whether legislative or financial to management and implementation of ambitious transition pathways This will be publicised as a short document and be addressed to EU and national decision makers

result.title: Energy transition diaries
result.description: The main lessons learned between lighthouse and pilot cities regarding the themes that the study visits will be organized around will be published as three Energy transition diaries (in English) online as elaborated blogposts – they are written from the viewpoint of one of the participating pilot cities. The diaries will become part of the TOMORROW toolbox to be shared with interested cities. (M1, 6, 10)

result.title: Project website
result.description: This will be used for knowledge systematisation and dissemination. It will enable easy viewing of publications, multimedia and blogs, and include a presentation of objectives, activities, member organisations, project reports, links to research and policy papers produced by non-member organisations, pointers to relevant websites, and other deliverables deemed public. Open Access Online Hub with a user-friendly interface will be the core of the website hosting all main content produced and allowing for easy access and free download. The website will be maintained for at least 5 years after completion of the project to ensure that results can be exploited after completion.

result.title: European narrative on post carbon cities 2050
result.description: These short narratives will explain the benefits of developing a 2050 transition roadmaps together with citizens It will include the previously joint development of the narratives in the pilot cities It will be written in a visual and storytelling format eg brochure in order to facilitate understanding and dissemination to a wider public This narrative will share the collaborative roadmapping with citizens in an inspiring and motivating fashion for replication
